original_text: And they did not ask for an accounting from the men into whose hand they delivered the money to pay out to the workmen, for they dealt honestly.
korean_text: 또 그 은을 받아 일꾼에게 주는 사람들과 회계하지 아니하였으니 이는 그들이 성실히 일을 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And they did not ask for an accounting
from the men into whose hand they delivered the money
to pay out to the workmen
